```{r}
library(readr)
student <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/course-107-1-programming-for-data-science/master/data/student.csv")
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
student %<>% mutate(
  `身高級距`=cut(`身高`,c(0,150,155,160,165,170,175,180,185,200)))
```
